requirements.description: Sentry collects data that you configure to be sent, typically errors, API calls, page loads, or similar requests and responses.
By default, Sentry does not collect personally identifiable information (PII), but additional context and metadata can be included if you choose to send it.
Sentry processes the data sent to it to provide application monitoring services.
You must disclose in your app privacy policy all types of data collected by your app, including data sent to Sentry.
